BundleInfo.name: ChimeraX-AmberMD
BundleInfo.Author: Evan Jones
BundleInfo.Synopsis: Read AMBER NetCDF trajectories and compute MD statistics (RMSD, RMSF, Rg)
BundleInfo.Description: Provides a command and a graphical tool to analyze Amber MD NetCDF trajectories: RMSD, RMSF, and radius of gyration. Includes a file reader for .nc trajectories.
